title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 630.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 630.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part applies to the Office for People With Developmental

Disabilities (OPWDD) and its local administrative offices, the Developmental

Disabilities Services Offices (DDSOs). It does not apply to voluntary agencies
or private providers of services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
630.1

Amended

New

York State Register November 15, 2017 /Volume XXXIX, Issue 46, eff. 11/15/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
